sentences.en: A blanket insurance policy insures a car against all kinds of accidents.
sentences.cn: 一张综合保险单担保汽车一切意外事件.

sentences.en: A blanket keeps us warm because it is woollen and thick.
sentences.cn: 毯子给我们保暖,因为它用羊毛制成而且很厚.

sentences.en: A blanket of silence descended.
sentences.cn: 大家都沉默不语。

sentences.en: Does your electric blanket conform to BS 3456?
sentences.cn: 你们的电热毯达到英国的3456标准了吗？

sentences.en: Fold the blanket back.
sentences.cn: 把毛毯折回来。

sentences.en: He had pulled the blanket over his body to hide his nakedness.
sentences.cn: 他把毛毯扯过来裹住自己赤裸的身体。

sentences.en: He lapped his daughter in a warm blanket.
sentences.cn: 他把女儿裹在一个暖和的毯子里。

sentences.en: He tossed his blanket aside and got up.
sentences.cn: 他把毯子掀到一边起了身。

sentences.en: He was given only a wooden pallet with a blanket.
sentences.cn: 只给了他一张硬板小床和一条毯子。

sentences.en: He wrapped himself in a blanket.
sentences.cn: 他把毯子裹在身上.

sentences.en: His brother beat out the flames with a blanket.
sentences.cn: 他哥哥用毯子把火扑灭了。

sentences.en: I fixed her hair like they do in the circus with the bright blanket across her back and a flower behind her ear.
sentences.cn: 我修理她的像他们的头发向后地横过她的在和明亮的毛毯马戏团中做和在她的耳朵后面的一朵花。

sentences.en: I like that nice blanket.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢那条漂亮的毯子。

sentences.en: Scoop the blanket weed out and use it to line hanging baskets.
sentences.cn: 把那些丝状水藻捞出来，垫在吊篮里。

sentences.en: She huddled herself in the blanket.
sentences.cn: 她用毯子紧紧裹住自己。

sentences.en: The bill gives sensitive police files a blanket exemption.
sentences.cn: 该议案提出警方机密档案全部免责.

sentences.en: The blanket will provide additional warmth and comfort in bed.
sentences.cn: 毛毯能让你睡得更温暖、更舒适。

sentences.en: The mud disappeared under a blanket of snow.
sentences.cn: 泥地在一层白雪的覆盖下消失不见了。

sentences.en: There's already a blanket ban on foreign unskilled labour in Japan.
sentences.cn: 日本已经有一项禁止使用外国非熟练工人的通用禁令。

sentences.en: There's an extra blanket in the bottom drawer of the cupboard.
sentences.cn: 壁橱最下面的抽屉里还有一条多余的毯子。

sentences.en: They muffled up her head with a blanket.
sentences.cn: 他们用毯子蒙住了她的头。

sentences.en: They tried to smother the flames with a damp blanket.
sentences.cn: 他们试图用一条湿毯子去灭火.

words.tran_cn: 可憎的；可恶的；毫无道理的
[经]总括的，全体的；没有限制的
覆盖，[电子]掩盖；用毯覆盖

phrases.tran_cn: 毛毯辊筒；毛毯烘缸；橡皮布滚筒

phrases.phrase: born on the wrong side of the blanket

phrases.tran_cn: 安全毯；带给人安全感的熟悉的物体
扫兴的人；湿毯子；扫兴的事

trans.tran_en: You use blanket to describe something when you want to emphasize that it affects or refers to every person or thing in a group, without any exceptions
a cover for a bed, usually made of wool
to cover something with a thick layer
